players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob's death on night 1 means we lost someone important. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among the three of us remaining. Does anyone have information to share?"
Charlie: "Alice, Diana, I think we should focus on who might have had reason to target Bob. Bob didn't say much yesterday, so maybe the killer is trying to stay quiet. What do you both think?"
You: "Alice here. I investigated Charlie last night and found out they are the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest Charlie now before they kill again."
You: "Alice here again. Charlie is the mafioso—I confirmed it last night. Diana, please vote with me to arrest Charlie so we can stop the killings."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective and investigated Charlie, then we should definitely vote Charlie out. I trust your investigation and we can't afford to let the mafioso survive another night."

Charlie: "Charlie here. I think Alice and Diana are trying to rush the vote without considering all possibilities. Why would Alice immediately accuse me without any hesitation? Could this be a setup to mislead us?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
